author: James Bennett
text:
Good day colleagues,
   The City of Presque Isle, Maine is seeking a list of qualified consultants to assist us with a capital campaign/fund raising effort to seek outside funding of half of the cost of a voter supported community center (estimated to cost $7.5 million).  A RFQ will hit the streets in the next week or so.
    If there are any communities that have used such a firm, could you please send me the name and location of the firm, along with any comments to me directly at jbennett@presqueisleme.us?  We are obviously more interested in firms in the Northeast US or Canada.
     Thank you in advance for your assistance.   Happy New Year
Jim Bennett,  PI, ME  City Manager
title: Listing of Capital Campaign and/or Fund Raising Consultants
